column1: Kata Robata////Moving on to the main menu
column2: we got the miso crusted bone marrow
column4: tempura shrimp and the toro sashimi. Despite the disappointing happy hour menu everything off of the main menu was pretty good. However
column5: if I could recommend one thing it would be the kobe beef skewers. The meat literally melted in your mouth and the pesto was a great compliment to the fatty beef. Rawr I'm drooling just thinking about it now. The miso crusted bone marrow was a little overdone and had very little flavor
column6: tempura shrimp was not worth the price and the toro sashimi(fatty tuna) is good like always.
